docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Roman Catholic medical experts said yesterday that many of the Vatican's new teachings on human reproduction had already been incorporated into the medical practices of hospitals affiliated with the church.

headline.main: HOSPITALS ACTED AHEAD OF THE VATICAN

docs.snippet: LEAD: Roman Catholic medical experts said yesterday that many of the Vatican's new teachings on human reproduction had already been incorporated into the medical practices of hospitals affiliated with the church.
